summary: LESS THAN A YEAR A 3RD  AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION HAD TO BE REPLACED.  THE 2ND ONE FAILED WHILE DRIVING BACK FROM REPAIR SHOP, CAR WAS LEAKING FLUID.  REPAIR SHOP DIAGNOSED LEAKING TRANSMISSION FLUID, AND RECOMMENDED DEALER REPLACEMENT.  DEALER SERVICE DEPT ADVISED FRONT PUMP FAILED, AND REPLACED.  THIS WAS NOW THE 4TH TRANSMISSION ON A CAR WITH EXACTLY 60,000 MILES.  FRONT PUMP FAILED ON THIS TRANSMISSION AFTER ONLY 6,000 MILES IN ONE YEAR.     *TT
